title: Vendetta: An Exciting Action Story About the Mob
description: A tragic suicide, a vicious attack and a dark family secret begin the story of Eddie D'Amico, who struggles to maintain his love and humanity in spite of being born into a world of crime and betrayal. An exciting action story about the Mob, inspired by true events, Ed Frederico manages to tell a tale that is impossible to put down, a true inside view of the workings of family life and the human condition.
author: Ed Frederico
